name: 凌凱
objective: 本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
schedule:
September 9: Interviewing new students, review of last semester's contents, weekend activities
September 16: Lesson 7 - Auxiliary verb "können"
September 23: Lesson 7 - Auxiliary verb "wollen"
September 30: Lesson 7 - Introduction new grammar: Perfekt, dictation
October 7: Lesson 7 - Practicing Perfekt, typical sounds&expressions
October 14: Lesson 7 - Review and test
October 21: Lesson 8 - Jobs and occupations
October 28: Lesson 8 - Introduction new grammar: Dativ
November 4: Lesson 8 - Introducing new grammar: Präteritum (verbs haben/sein)
November 11: Lesson 8 - Talking about the past
November 18: Lesson 8 - Internship, unusual jobs
November 25: Lesson 8 - Review and test
December 2: Lesson 9 - In a foreign city, auxiliary verb "müssen"
December 9: Lesson 9 - Introducing new grammar: Imperativ
December 16: Lesson 9 - Auxiliary verb "dürfen"
December 23: Lesson 9 - Reading brochures, at the hotel reception
December 30: Lesson 9 - Review and test
January 6: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Class participation: 10%
Assignments: 20%
Quizzes: 10%
Midterm exam: 30%
Final exam: 30%
materials: As a textbook we use "Schritte International 1 & 2". It is a good choice for teaching German because of its systematic training of the four different skills: reading, listening, speaking, and writing. Included are a workbook (used for doing exercises at home) and three audio CDs.
